text: Judiya plopens nab okok, man keke kuŋay mɨdeb agɨl tɨkak agɨlak. Man sɨkol Betlehem nɨgel sɨkol tek lup ak pen, Bɨawl yɨbɨl olap man anɨb ak nɨb ownɨgab agɨl tɨkak agɨlak. Ne apɨl, God binɨb ne Yislel kay kɨlop kod yenɨgab agɨl tɨkak agɨlak. Anɨgɨnɨgab tek man sɨkol Betlehem yɨb awl yenɨgab agɨl tɨkak agɨlak.
